fn.p: Edited by: Noèlia Fernàndez-Castillo, Centre for Biomedical Network Research (CIBER), Spain

Reviewed by: Lisabeth Fisher DiLalla, Southern Illinois University Carbondale, United States; Riley L. Marshall, Southern Illinois University, United States, in collaboration with reviewer LD; Hyun Ruisch, University of Groningen, Netherlands
This article was submitted to Behavioral and Psychiatric Genetics, a section of the journal Frontiers in Psychiatry
